name: NewTetris
body:
A Tetris game in Java. I had orginally implemented this back in 2003.

![screenshot](images/JRTetris.png)

Download the game jar from [here](http://joergreichert.github.io/NewTetris/download/newtetris.jar) and execute the jar either by double click or with java -jar newtetris.jar.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
